item.title: Moving Files Around In R
item.description: Intro Recently, I have a project requires some automation. By googling and reading answers on StackOverFlow, I learned quite a lot, I think it’s better to document these little tricks here. The automation can be decomposed into below operations: Creating 24 folders with similar naming patterns Copy same code into 24 folders Change each code’s contents slightly, like input dataset name, output dataset file location, etc. Run same UNIX command on different directory Covert each code’s output files from xls to xlsx Creating 24 folders with similar naming patterns I found this blog post really helpful, it includes common tips related to manipulate files in r.
